类型: Color: Arm Sleeves for Women Mall Goth
评论详情: The look great but nearly impossible to put on by yourself. I have a few different varieties of this style and I can buckle/tighten them easily. The straps are very thin and lightweight and threading them in the buckle, and securing, is really hard. If you have someone do that part you're in luck. If you like the dangly look then you're all set. I don't think they can handle too much hand usage without tearing.
